strings.evolution:
So I had power like this lying
inside me this whole time...
strings.affinity:
To known I've become a martial artist
worthy of gaining someone's trust...
It just warms my heart.
strings.description: A martial artist who leads others in investigating and dealing with monster-related incidents in the Kingdom of Pharm. Though he wants to be strong like the person who defeated him back when he was a proud and determined young man, he has some serious fears concerning ghosts and the like.
strings.fusion:
Limit breaking power...
All that's left is to prepare the soul.
strings.summon:
This temporary body...
This ghost like form of mine,
use it as you will.

strings.affinity:
To known I've become a martial artist
worthy of gaining someone's trust...
It just warms my heart.
strings.description: A martial artist in command of eradicating monsters and patrolling the Kingdom of Pharm. Though blessed with talent and a good physique from a young age, though of by many as a prodigy, one day he was defeated by a travelling martial artist which shook him to his very core. Though he aims to defeat that person, there is still much he is unable to get over.
strings.fusion:
It's kind of strange, I guess,
but it is a sort of...training.
strings.summon:
I'm now a...vision?
As long as I'm not a gh-ghost...

strings.evolution:
I've got my techniques down.
So this is what you call an awakening?
strings.affinity:
To known I've become a martial artist
worthy of gaining someone's trust...
It just warms my heart.
strings.description: A martial artist from the Kingdom of Pharm. Though highly trusted and capable, responsible for investigating incidents and performing exterminations, he is secretly afraid of reapers type monsters like ghosts and skeletons, making it hard for him sometimes to complete his work. He appears to have a strong mind since this does not affect his fighting, but he still doesn't like ghost stories.
strings.fusion: I wonder if training like this affects the soul, as well?
strings.summon: I can't believe I became one of these ghastly visions.
